title: Control the Elder Brain
content:
will of the netherbrain, a cutscene will show the Netherbrain in pain, begging to be spared. Orpheus is trying to retain the brain. You will have the following dialogue options.

Go ahead. Command the brain to destroy all the tadpoles and then itself. [MELEE ATTACK] Betray Orpheus. Dominate the brain. Become the Absolute.

Choosing dialogue 1 will show the Netherbrain obeying your command. You are in pain from the parasite burning in your brain. For the first time your thoughts are your own but
